resources.string:
Geography Trivia will help remind you of worlds interesting facts you know and also tell you some of unknown facts.

Made this app for 30 days of Kotlin by Google using Kotlin!

 Also wants to thanks Muskan Jain And Dipit Vasdev for their help and ideas. Love you 3000!!
Background Credits: Abhishek Jamwal

Select the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question.\n\nIf you get the answer wrong, your game ends! You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.
